name: Stage Builder Builder Test Builder
description:
This is not exactly a full "game." Really, this is just a showcase for a tool I'm making for Unity, a Stage Builder Builder, which I plan to eventually publish on the Unity Asset Store as a tool for allowing user-generated content in puzzle platformer games. The tool will be used in my other project, Fail to Win.

I've been having problems with it running on Chrome, so if most of the screen appears black, try a different web browser. Also, I had to disable opening and saving stages until I can fix some JavaScript.
